name: Curious Spaceman
description:
Changes from course's protupe:

- Level tutorials for both of 2 new unique levels

- New pickups, namely additional jump (yellow helmet) and additional speed (violet helmet)

- New mechanic of going up Acid, player has to avoid it in time or else the 2nd level is failed

- Other minor changes such as different sounds, flying enemies, usage of background details for navigation and so on
